content: Clace is an open-source project aimed at enabling a secure and easy way to develop and deploy internal applications for enterprise usecase.
summary: Clace is an open-source project aimed at enabling a secure and easy way to develop and deploy internal applications for enterprise usecase.
title: About Clace

content:
Clace is an open-source project aimed at enabling a secure and easy way to develop and deploy internal applications for enterprise usecase. Clace provides: Secure platform with application sandboxing
Docker integration HTML template driven UI interface
Github integration
Starlark for application configuration (Python like)
Golang based backend for simplifying deployments
Sign up for email updates Subscribe
title: Clace

content:
Securely develop and deploy internal applications
This is a demo site built entirely using Congo. It also contains a complete set of theme documentation. Congo is flexible and is great for both static page-based content (like this demo) or a traditional blog with a feed of recent posts.
summary: Securely develop and deploy internal applications
title: Welcome to Clace Docs
